description.value: You know how to blend in and become a forgettable face in the crowd. While in a crowd of at least 10 other creatures, you can roll a Society check in place of a Stealth check when using the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Avoid Notice] exploration activity to see if enemies notice you. While in a settlement, you can use [[/act impersonate skill=society]]{Society} in place of Deception when Impersonating a non-specific individual.
